attributes.action: Ban people for using toilet paper ONLY to wipe their bottoms for hygiene reasons
attributes.background: Using Tissue is not good enough for wiping as there are some substances still there. Want to raise awareness and improve hygiene and complaints from people about stinky smells. Water should be applied after the wiping as it cleans properly and will prevent any bum diseases and infections

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this is something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to fund a nationwide campaign about toilet hygiene if that is something you would like to see happen.
